spec_data.Name: perl-Test
spec_data.Description:
The Test Perl module simplifies the task of writing test files for Perl modules,
such that their output is in the format that Test::Harness expects to see.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Mon 25 Sep 2017 10:50:32 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Simple framework for writing test scripts
